benchmark_details.name: GameTraversalBenchmark (GTB)
benchmark_details.overview: GameTraversalBenchmark (GTB) evaluates the planning abilities of large language models (LLMs) through traversal in diverse 2D grid-based game maps.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the planning abilities of large language models through traversal in diverse 2D grid-based game maps.

data.source: Generated via the Word2World game design system.
data.annotation: Automatically generated by the Word2World system.

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated based on the distance to objectives, actions taken, and generation errors.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better planning and traversal capabilities of the LLM.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4-Turbo achieved a GTB Score of 44.97%.
methodology.validation: Tested against multiple LLMs and evaluated using a composite scoring system.
